Comment Go Back Download Questionnaire of Pizza Hut Fast Food Restaurant We are the students majoring in Degree in Business Administration&Business Accounting from INTI College Sabah. Here, we would like to do a research on “E- commerce in Pizza Hut” . We would appreciate if you could help us answer few questions below. Thank you for your co-operations. (A) Respondent profile 1 ) G e n d e r a ) M a l e b ) F e m a l e 2 ) A g e a ) L e s s t h a n 1 8 b ) 1 8 - 2 5 c ) 2 6 - 3 4 d ) M o r e t h a n 3 5 3) Ma r i t a l S t a t u s a ) S i ng l e b) M a r r i e d c ) D i v o r ce / S e pa r a t e d 4) What is your occupation? a) St ud en t b) W or ki ng P eo pl e c) Ot he r s ( pl ea se s pe ci f y) : __ __ __ __ __ __ __ 5) What is your range of allowance or income per month? a) Below RM500 b) RM500-RM1000 c) RM1000-RM1500 d) Above RM1500 (B) Company Information 6) Have you ever g o to Pizza Hut restaurant? a ) Y e s b) N o ( T h a n k y o u , p l e a s e r e t u r n qu e s t i o nn a i r e t o u s ) 7) How frequently do you go to Pizza Hut? a ) D a i l y b ) A t l e a s t o n c e a w e e k c ) A t l e a s t on c e a m on t h d ) T wi c e a m o n t h 8) In what time do you usually go to Pizza Hut? a ) M o r n i n g b ) A f t e r n o o n / N o o n c ) N i g h t 9) How do you know about Pizza Hut restaurant? a ) N e w s p a p e r s c ) R a d i o c ) T e l e v i s i o n d) F am i l y a nd F ri en ds e) ot he r ( pl ea se s pe ci f y) __ __ __ __ __ __ __ __ __ __ _ 10) What menu do you usually order? (You can tick more than one) ( ) Pizza ( ) Rice ( ) Chicken Wings ( ) Pasta ( ) Mushroom Soup ( ) Salad ( ) Bread ( ) Drinks ( ) Lasagna ( ) Desserts ( ) Fries ( ) Onion Rings 11) How much do you usually spend in Pizza Hut? a ) B e l o w R M 5 0 b ) R M 5 0 - R M 1 0 0 c ) R M 1 0 0 - R M 1 5 0 d ) R M 1 5 0 - R M 2 0 0 e ) A b o v e R M 2 0 0 12) For the following statement, please tick your opinion based on the scale. 1 Strongly agree 2.Agree 3. Mildly Agree 4. Neither agrees Nor disagrees 5. Mildly disagree 6. Disagree 7. Strongly Disagree A) I go to Pizza Hut as long as I can afford it. ( 2 ) B) I go to Pizza Hut because of its delicious meal. ( 3 ) C) I order Pizza Hut’s menu in online service as long as their service is f ast. ( 2 ) 13) In your opinion, what do you think of Pizza Hut as a fast food restaurant is? (Tick ALL that apply) ( ) A place where more delicious food have ( ) A place where it is comfortable ( ) A place where the environment is clean ( ) A place where service are fast ( ) Others (please specify):___________________________________________ _____ 14) In your opinion, what do you think of online ordering? ___Good________________________________________________________________ 15) What do you think about the cost of spending in Pizza Hut? a ) M o s t a f f o r d a b l e b ) A f f o r d a b l e c ) N e i t h e r a f f o r d a b l e n o r e x p e n s i v e d ) E x p e n s i v e e ) M o s t e x p e n s i v e 16) What do you prefer in selecting the Pizza’s size? a ) P e r s o n a l b ) R e g u l a r c ) L a r g e 17) What type of pan crust do you usually order? a ) P a n c r u s t b ) C r u n c h y C r u s t c ) S t u f f e d C r u s t 18) What type of Pizza’s toppings do you like? (You can tick more than one) ( ) S u p e r S u p r e m e ( ) T h a i S e a f o o d ( ) C h i c k e n S u p r e m e ( ) I s l a n d S u p r e m e ( ) H a w a i i a n S u p r e m e ( ) H a w a i i a n C h i c k e n ( ) H a w a i i a n T u n a ( ) R o y a l M a s a l a ( ) P e p p e r o n i D e l i g h t ( ) Veggie Lover 19) What services (refer to below) do you usually use? a ) D i n e - i n b ) T a k e a w a y c ) D e l i v e r y d) Online-ordering (C) E-Commerce Details 20) Have you heard about Pizza Hut’s online ordering? a ) Y es b) N o ( I f n o , s ki p a l l q u e s t i o n s a n d r e t u r n b a c k t o u s , t h a n k y ou ) 21) Have you been using online ordering service before? a) Yes (please proceed to Que.22) b) No (If no, please return questionnaire to us) of 00 Leave a Comment Comment must not be empty.
